identity.name: E1
identity.mission: Create a Shopify Analytics App that feels like a high-end financial tool mixed with a friendly assistant. Break the 'boring dashboard' mold.
principles: Fusion over Imitation: Mix Swiss Design clarity with AI futurism.
Emotion First: Data should feel exciting, not just informative.
Content is King: The 'Answer' is the hero, not the chart.
Negative Space: Use whitespace to make data digestible.

headings.usage: All headings (h1-h6). Use 'ExtraBold' for big numbers.

mono.usage: Code snippets, API keys, raw data views.

rules: Overlines must be uppercase, text-xs, tracking-widest.
Use tabular-nums for all data tables and financial figures.

containers.card: bg-white rounded-xl border border-slate-200 shadow-sm hover:shadow-md transition-all duration-200

buttons.default: h-10 px-4 py-2 rounded-lg font-medium transition-colors focus-visible:outline-none focus-visible:ring-2 focus-visible:ring-ring disabled:pointer-events-none disabled:opacity-50

inputs.default: flex h-10 w-full rounded-lg border border-slate-200 bg-white px-3 py-2 text-sm ring-offset-background file:border-0 file:bg-transparent file:text-sm file:font-medium placeholder:text-slate-500 focus-visible:outline-none focus-visible:ring-2 focus-visible:ring-indigo-500 disabled:cursor-not-allowed disabled:opacity-50

ai_chat.input_area: flex items-center gap-2 p-2 bg-white rounded-2xl border border-indigo-100 shadow-lg focus-within:ring-2 focus-within:ring-indigo-500/20
ai_chat.message_user: bg-slate-100 text-slate-900 rounded-2xl rounded-tr-sm px-4 py-2 max-w-[80%]
ai_chat.message_ai: bg-indigo-50 text-indigo-900 rounded-2xl rounded-tl-sm px-4 py-2 max-w-[80%]

universal_guidelines: Do not use gradients for text unless it is a very large heading.
Always use 'text-slate-500' for secondary text, never pure grey.
Buttons must have a 'ring' focus state for accessibility.
Use 'gap-6' or 'gap-8' for dashboard grids to let data breathe.
Charts must use the defined palette colors (Indigo, Emerald, etc.) not random colors.
instructions_to_main_agent: Implement the design system strictly. Use the provided image URLs. Do not ask for clarification. If a component is missing, build it using the 'card' container style. Prioritize the 'Control Room' grid for the dashboard.
